thread.title: Jamie
thread.title_full: American Frame americanframe.com reviewed by Jamie

author: Jamie
title: Jamie
text: The frame is amazing. But before you start to put everything together "if you have never done this before" go online and watch how to videos. You don't want to just wing anything when handling expensive artworks. Depending on the frame size you may need to pack the back of the frame to take the bow out of the fomecore board. Use the cardboard the Matt came with, until you can get more archival fomecore board. But even with these extra steps the entire process is as easy as they could possibly make it. And the frame looks and feels amazing, I am very happy I spent my money with them.
